data.message: Hi Marshall, I already bought your "Guts Over Fear". And I think your face and songs are so sad recently. And every time I feel your sadness, I want to hug you. But unfortunately I can't. But please remember, your fans always support you! You already supported us with your songs. And we are ready to support you anytime. And please make a happy song when you feel our support:) And of course I'll buy it :)
